name: Kyle Simulator
detailed_description:
About Kyle Simulator:


Kyle Simulator is not only an experience, but also an every day life of mister Kyle. Ever wanted to be one but unfortunately your name isn't Kyle? Well, in this simulation experience you will do everything a Kyle would. Punch walls & drink energy drinks. Game on!

Kyle Simulator Features:


  • Third-person view
  • Wall punching experience
  • Energy Drinks collection system
  • Realistic wall breaking physics

Kyle Simulator Planned Features:



  • Virtual Reality support (Free)
  • In-game weapons, such as bats, knifes and much more
  • Vehicles

short_description: Kyle Simulator is not only an experience, but also an every day life of mister Kyle. Ever wanted to be one but unfortunately your name isn't Kyle? Well, in this simulation experience you will do everything a Kyle would. Punch walls & drink energy drinks. Game on!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 8
  • Processor: INTEL i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: INTEL i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
